name: team_domain_change
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community The team domain has changed  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					team:read 				 The team_domain_change event is sent to all connections for a team when the team domain changes. Since the existing domain will continue to work (causing a redirect) until it is claimed by another team, clients don't need to do anything special with this event. It is sent for the benefit of our web client, which needs to reload when the domain changes.
